alert.note: Alert for Buckeye, Avondale; Central Phoenix; East Valley; North Phoenix, Glendale; Northwest Pinal County; Northwest Valley; Scottsdale, Paradise Valley; South Mountain, Ahwatukee; Southeast Valley, Queen Creek (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 9:52PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Maricopa and Pinal Counties through 1045 PM MST... At 952 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Glendale to Phoenix to Sky Harbor Airport to near Chandler Fashion Center Mall. Movement was west at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Phoenix, Mesa, Chandler, Glendale, Scottsdale, Gilbert, Tempe, Avondale, El Mirage, Paradise Valley, Tolleson, Youngtown, Waddell, Laveen, Cashion, Sun City, Sun Lakes, Queen Creek, Litchfield Park and Tempe Marketplace. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 129 and 171. AZ Interstate 17 between mile markers 195 and 212. AZ Route 51 between mile markers 1 and 13. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Buckeye, Avondale; Central Phoenix; East Valley; North Phoenix, Glendale; Northwest Pinal County; Northwest Valley; Scottsdale, Paradise Valley; South Mountain, Ahwatukee; Southeast Valley, Queen Creek
